Title: Proving that $\sum_{i=0}^{n}\binom{n}{i}i^{n-i}(n-i)^{i}\le\frac{1}{2}n^n$

$$\displaystyle\sum_{i=0}^{n}\binom{n}{i}i^{n-i}(n-i)^{i}\le\dfrac{1}{2}n^n$$
where $\displaystyle\binom{n}{i}=\dfrac{n!}{i!(n-i)!}$. This inequality is very interesting. I think this problem has nice methods, but my method is very ugly.
